price: excepto aquel de quien Dios tenga misericordia. Él es el Poderoso, el Misericordioso.
arabic: إِلَّا مَن رَّحِمَ ٱللَّهُۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: illā man raḥima al-lahu innahu huwa al-ʿazīzu al-raḥīmu
